analysis.description:
CryptoMiningWar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#432-439) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr

CryptoMiningWar.hasBooster (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#432-439) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- boostData[revert_i].owner == addr
CryptoMiningWar.isCurrentRound (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#173-177) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(players[msg.sender].roundNumber == roundNumber)
	- require(bool)(players[msg.sender].roundNumber == roundNumber)

CryptoMiningWar.BASE_PRICE should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#97-98)
CryptoMiningWar.CRTSTAL_MINING_PERIOD should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#93-94)
CryptoMiningWar.HALF_TIME should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#94-95)
CryptoMiningWar.MINIMUM_LIMIT_SELL should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#100)
CryptoMiningWar.RANK_LIST_LIMIT should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#98-100)
CryptoMiningWar.ROUND_TIME should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x0de197dc289d680e734ccab866d529505b2638db.sol#95-96)
